title: Genius Sessions: Kraut Cocktails & Ham Water | Soleil Ho & Justin Phillips
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • Acclaimed Seattle Chef's Staff Quits After Sexual Misconduct Allegations (NYT)
  • Justin's write up of Rat Bar
  • The Avery, where Soleil tried the kraut cocktail

Is there a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Justin Phillips, Soleil Ho)

itunes:title: Genius Sessions: Kraut Cocktails & Ham Water | Soleil Ho & Justin Phillips
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Justin Phillips, Soleil Ho
itunes:summary: In Genius Sessions episodes, Kristen has cozy, unfiltered conversations with luminaries from all over the food world. This week, Extra Spicy hosts Soleil Ho and Justin Phillips on their most genius sips lately, red-hot food news, and kissing rats.
